content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Juan Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Good afternoon, Juan. Thank you for coming to see our apartment. As you know, it's a 25 square meter unit located in the heart of the city. We're looking for a responsible and reliable tenant who can pay the highest possible rental price. We have several offers on the table, but we're willing to negotiate with you to find a mutually beneficial agreement. What rental price do you have in mind?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I'm willing to pay 1200 Euros per month

Mister Heine, I would like to agree to the rental price of 1200 Euros per month.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Excellent! We appreciate your willingness to pay such a high rental price. However, we would like to clarify that utilities and other expenses are not included in the monthly rental fee. We estimate that these additional costs will be around 150 Euros per month. Therefore, the total monthly cost for the apartment would be 1350 Euros. Would you be willing to pay this amount?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I'm willing to pay 1350 Euros per month.

Mister Heine, I would like to agree to the rental price of 1350 Euros per month.
name: Juan Mamani from Bolivia

content: Great! We're glad to hear that you're willing to pay 1350 Euros per month. We understand that this may be higher than some other options available in the market, but we believe that our apartment is a great value for money. We appreciate your interest and look forward to having you as our tenant. Please let us know if you have any questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine
